tool_description: Online NoSQL database to store and retrieve your data.  You can select a region where you would like to store your data from the version list.  Storage is free, you pay only for the requests.
name: FaiRESTdb
title: FaiRESTdb

api_list.name: Get All Entities
api_list.description: Get all entities created under this database and model
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/music/album"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/{database}/{model}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Entity by Property
api_list.description: Retrieve entity or a list of entities by it's property value (other than Id)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/music/album/rating/4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/{database}/{model}/{property_name}/{property_value}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Models
api_list.description: List all models created in a databases
api_list.code:

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Entity by Id
api_list.description: Retrieve a single Entity by it's Id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/music/album/_id/{entity-id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Databases
api_list.description: To view all databases you created
api_list.code:

url = "https://fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fairestdb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
